item.title: Venus Vacation PRISM: DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme ‘On This Island, The Moment of Love’ trailer, official FAQ
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/venus-vacation-prism-dead-or-alive-xtreme-on-this-island-the-moment-of-love-trailer-official-faq

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5

Romance adventure game due out on March 27 in Japan and Asia.

Publisher Koei Tecmo and developer Team NINJA have released the third short trailer and an official FAQ for romance adventure game Venus Vacation PRISM: DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme.

Here is the full FAQ:

■ Specs

Are there differences in expressions depending on platforms or regions?

There are no differences in expressions depending on platforms or regions.

Are there differences in features depending on platforms?

Some features differ among Steam, DMM Games, PlayStation 5, and PlayStation 4 versions.

  • Steam Version
    • Supports keyboard and mouse operation.
    • Can set pause and mute when the window is inactive.
    • Button display type can be selected when using a controller.
    • Quality of graphic elements can be customized.
    • Upscaling (Bilinear / AMD FSR 1 / AMD FSR 2 / DLSS) available.
    • Maximum frames per second (30 / 60) can be selected.
      • Note: Some scenes are fixed at 30 frames per second.
  • PlayStation 5 Version
    • Resolution modes (Prioritize Resolution / Prioritize FPS) can be selected in settings.
      • Prioritize Resolution mode: 4K resolution.
      • Prioritize FPS mode: full high-definition resolution.
    • Maximum frames per second fixed at 60 frames per second.
      • Note: Some scenes are fixed at 30 frames per second.
  • PlayStation 4 Version
    • Supports only full high-definition resolution.
    • Maximum FPS fixed at 30 frames per second.

■ Bonuses

Is there a serial code for the early purchase bonus in the physical version?

The initial production physical versions include a sticker labeled “Early Purchase Bonus.” The PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 versions contain a serial code inside. For the Steam version, the bonus is automatically granted, so there is only an explanation note without a serial code.

How do I obtain the DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme Venus Vacation linked purchase bonus?

  • For the PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Steam versions, you can issue a download serial code for DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme Venus Vacation from the in-game start screen in Venus Vacation PRISM.
  • For the DMM Games version, the download serial code will be distributed via email from DMM GAMES to the customer. The issued download serial code can be used in DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme Venus Vacation by navigating to “Options” → “Serial Code.”

Venus Vacation PRISM: DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme is due out for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam and DMM Games Player on March 27 in Japan and Asia. For PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4, the Japanese release will only support Japanese as a language option, while the Asian release (which the official website labels as the “Global Version”) will support English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language options. The Steam version will also support these language options.

Watch the trailer and the Venus Vacation PRISM: DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme Pre-Launch Live Stream archive below.

Short Trailer #3: On This Island, The Moment of Love

English

Japanese

Traditional Chinese

Venus Vacation PRISM: DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme Pre-Launch Live Stream

item.title: UNYIELDER launches in May
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/unyielder-launches-in-may

  • PC

Roguelite first-person shooter action game gets a release window.

Roguelite first-person shooter action game UNYIELDER will launch for PC via Steam in May, publisher Shueisha Games and developer TrueWorld Studios announced. It will support English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, French, German, and Spanish language options. A “Prologue” demo is currently available.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

UNYIELDER is an intense single-player boss-rush movement first-person shooter with an absurd and exploitable rogue-looter. Assemble your arsenal of destruction, smash your way through Antarctica, and face your own final boss.

UNYIELDER unites looter-shooters, movement first-person shooters, and character action games in an infinitely expandable roguelite to create spectacular, absurd and chaotic boss battles.

Boss Rush / Rogue-Looter / Movement First-Person Shooter

  • Break the Game – Like any good toy, play with it vigorously, experiment. (And have fun!)
  • Embody Tenacity – The further you go, the more dangerous the world becomes. (But so do you!)
  • Domination – Gather unique weapons and perks to empower your build and playstyle. (Or just pick the weird stuff, who’s going to stop you?)
  • BYOBoss – With parts from enemies you defeat, customize the Final Boss to unlock special weapons, perks and characters.

Erebus, the Capital City of Antarctica, 1972

A hotspot for apocalyptic-level events, after decades of existential torment, Erebus finally collapsed. Towering derelicts of the once concrete utopia are buried in dunes of rust: “PNEUMA,” a by-product of entropic weapons; Man-made “Heaven.”

Key Features

  • Carve Your Path – Journey through the war-torn lands of Erebus, Defeat enemies, loot weapons, grow in power. The Fool awaits.
  • A Walking Cataclysm of Your Own Design – Wield Rupture, Rhapsody, and Reverie, volatile sources of ineffable power. Unleash your unique brand of devastation with bizarre weapons and perks.
  • Build Your Final Boss – Scavenge the limbs of slain enemies and build your own Pattern of machine-god punching bag. Unique combinations alter the boss fight. Discover hidden Patterns to pave for new, Endgame Character classes, Weapons, Perks and other Secrets.
  • Original Soundtrack – Featuring an original soundtrack composed and produced by Karu.

Watch a new trailer below.

Boss Dossier #1: Meet the TENNULI
